title: Punjab National Bank, IIFCL sign pact for financing infra projects
description: PNB and IIFCL signed an agreement to offer financial assistance for infrastructure projects, aiming for consortium lending. The MoU signing involved Atul Kumar Goel and Padmanabhan Raja Jaishankar.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
